1.0.0.name: magento/composer-root-update-plugin
1.0.0.description: Plugin to look ahead for Magento project root changes when running composer update for new Magento versions

suggest.magento\/framework: Enables the Magento Composer Root Update Plugin's functionality for the Web Setup Wizard
